scenes.prompt: Close-up on ten-year-old Leo, freckled face pressed against the window, wearing a yellow swimsuit. Maya, pink goggles on her head, and Carlos with a deflated shark stand beside him, all looking glum. Overcast light, rain streaks on the glass. Focus on their disappointment. Static shot.

Medium shot of Leo, same yellow swimsuit, suddenly grinning mischievously. He grabs a neon-green pool noodle, brandishing it like a sword. The background is blurred, emphasizing his energetic movement. He declares, "The rain is our new water park!" Vibrant colors, determined expression. Slight zoom in on his face.

Wide shot of Leo, Maya, and Carlos, still in their swimsuits, joyously playing in the rain. Leo leads with the pool noodle. Maya splashes Carlos with water; Carlos retaliates with the inflatable shark. Rain pouring, bright swimsuits contrast the grey sky. Water splashing everywhere. Tracking shot following the action.

Close-up shot of Leo, rain plastering his hair, sliding down the water slide with arms raised in triumph. Friends cheering him from below. Low-angle shot emphasizing the dynamic movement. Sun peeks through dispersing clouds. Transition to a close up of all three kids now under a large umbrella, holding steaming mugs, smiling. Warm color tones.
